motivation.title: Motivation
motivation.body: The Skeet framework allows small developer teams to quickly launch apps and maintain them over the long term.

basic-architecture.title: Basic Architecture
basic-architecture.body: Describes the basic tree structure and usage of the Skeet Framework backend.

initial-deploy.title: Initial Deploy
initial-deploy.body: Once the first deployment is completed, automatic deployment by CI/CD will be triggered from subsequent commits

tutorial.title: Tutorial
tutorial.body: This tutorial will create a OpenAI API chat app using Skeet Framework.

skeet-firestore.title: Firestore Plugin
skeet-firestore.body: How to use type-safe Firestore in Skeet Framework.

react-native.title: React Native (Expo)
react-native.body: We're using React Native (Expo) on the frontend. We can use the Tailwind and React technology on mobile dev as well.

ssg-template.title: SSG Template (Next.js)
ssg-template.body: The project needs the website, blog and docs. So we have the starter for that with SSG on Next.js. SEO Ready.
